cast.name: 罗伊切比布朗 Roy 'Chubby' Brown

writer.name: 罗伊切比布朗 Roy 'Chubby' Brown

introduction: In these days of political correctness it`s difficult to find someone who will say in public everything that we all think in private. For over twenty years one man has consistently said exactly what he thinks.During one of this famed live shows. Chubby shares his thoughts ranging from Refugees, Michael Jackson, Midgets to Bin Laden. No one is free from Britain`s favourite fat B***ard - "The Legendary Roy Chubby Brown". Filmed in February 2003 this is Chubby at his very very best. If you were there you know what to expect if you weren`t then be prepared to be shocked and stunned as Chubby will have you rolling with laughter. This is the Chubby video you can`t afford to miss... its truly Chubby; It`s truly "Bad taste"!
